ygData.subject: Re: Jewelery Roller coaster
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, those prices are a bit on the low side. As I stated in a previous post, sell the items for what they are worth, not what it costs to make them. I have
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, those prices are a bit on the low side. As I stated in a previous post,
sell the items for what they are worth, not what it costs to make them. I
have seen flesh bands, which are loot-only items that give +2 to strength,
sell regularly for 15-20p. That would be stretching it for the rings we
could make, but I would suggest a minimum of 7p for the items that add 2 to
stats.

--------------------------------------------------------------

> I've noticed that latency and packet loss will tremendously effect
> my success/fail rate...so watch your meter...if it's over 600, don't
> bother....
>
> Fistlebane
>
> btw, I made several pieces of jewelry last night..my first magical
> items yet....and sold the bloodstone, Lapis, carnelian for 3pp each...and
> the Amber ones for 4pp....am I selling too low? I still had to work at
> finding buyers...so my guess is that I was right on target...taking a
> small
> markup above the cost of materials...since the added bonus to stats was
> only
> 2 or 3...
>
>
>
>
